content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Lab at position (-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (status: NO_POWER)

### Assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (status: NO_POWER)

### Boiler at position (-13.5, 20.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (status: FULL_OUTPUT)
- Small electric poles (positions: (-15.5, 18.5), (-15.5, 19.5), (-15.5, 21.5))
- Pipes (positions: (-11.5, 21.5), (-11.5, 20.5))

### Offshore pump at position (-10.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (status: WORKING)
- Pipes (positions: (-11.5, 23.5), (-10.5, 24.5), (-11.5, 24.5))

### Furnace at position (5.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel: 14 coal, produces: 13 iron plates)

### Furnace at position (-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel: 21 coal, produces: 63 copper plates)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing electric poles near structures
- Ensure there is enough space around the lab and assembling machine before attempting to place electric poles. Check for obstructions in the vicinity.

### Errors related to power supply
- The lab and assembling machine are currently without power. Verify the connections to the power source and ensure that electric poles are properly placed to connect these entities.

### Errors when connecting entities
- When attempting to connect entities, ensure that the target positions are valid and not obstructed. Review the connection points and adjust the positions of the electric poles if necessary.

### General tips for placing entities
- Always check the surrounding area for existing entities that may block placement before attempting to place new structures or poles.
